attributes.action: reconsider any payouts to families of terrorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned implore the Prime Minister & his government to reconsider the proposal of payments to families of terrorists whilst not allowing the same sort of payments to the victims or members of the Uniformed services who lost their lives because of terrorist action, especially during the period known as 'The Troubles' in Northern Ireland.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
